channel.title: Help pl0x
channel.description:
For some reason, I can't attack the npcs, I'm using a 562, a.k.a. notzscape.
I can't figure it out, I was told it's easy, it probably is, but I don't know which file it's located. I've checked the skills/combat and I'm sure it's not there.
Help would be appreciated.

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Here: uploaded it to uppit cause theres 20k character max.
http://uppit.com/k0h8ezykzujf/Copy_of_PlayerVsNpc.txt

short link: http://up.ht/qqG97R

EDIT: it’s probably not that though, cause I have the same method from my v1, it’s just this source has something blocking the combat.

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I InDrEk I, post:6, topic:418422”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=520965.msg3784861#msg3784861 date=1318783649]

PlayerVsNpc.java then

post the public void Attack.

here you go:

public void Attack(NPC n) { try { if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; } if(p.isDead() || n.isDead()) { p.resetAttack(); return; } if(p.AttackingNpc == false) { return; } n.pid = p.getIndex(); n.giveDrop = p.getIndex(); n.Attacking = true; if(autoCasting == true) { MagicAttack(p, n); } else if (usingRange(p)) { RangeAttack(p, n); } else { MeleeAttack(p, n); } } catch(Exception e) { } }
[/quote]But try replacing it with this but backup the old one first:

public void Attack(NPC n) { if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; } if(p.isDead() || n.isDead()) { p.resetAttack(); return; } if(p.AttackingNpc == false) { return; } Equipment e = p.getEquipment(); if(n.getId() == 3375) { if(e.get(Equipment.SLOT_WEAPON) == null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a rubber chicken to attack this"); n.Attacking = false; p.resetAttack(); return; } if(e.get(Equipment.SLOT_WEAPON).getId() != 4566) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a rubber chicken to attack this"); n.Attacking = false; p.resetAttack(); return; } } if (p.THICKSKIN == true && p.PrayerTime == 0) { n.hit(Misc.random(25)); p.PrayerTime = 15; n.graphics(1935); return; } if(p.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SLAYER) < p.getSlayer().getRequiredLevel(n.getId())) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of " + p.getSlayer().getRequiredLevel(n.getId()) + " slayer to attack this monster!"); p.resetAttack(); return; } n.pid = p.getIndex(); n.giveDrop = p.getIndex(); n.Attacking = true; if(autoCasting == true) { MagicAttack(p, n); } else if (usingRange(p)) { RangeAttack(p, n); } else { MeleeAttack(p, n); } }[/quote]

didn’t work, now I got 8 errors

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:5, topic:418422”][quote author=I InDrEk I link=topic=520965.msg3784860#msg3784860 date=1318783428]
PlayerVsNpc.java then

post the public void Attack.
[/quote]

here you go:

public void Attack(NPC n) { try { if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; } if(p.isDead() || n.isDead()) { p.resetAttack(); return; } if(p.AttackingNpc == false) { return; } n.pid = p.getIndex(); n.giveDrop = p.getIndex(); n.Attacking = true; if(autoCasting == true) { MagicAttack(p, n); } else if (usingRange(p)) { RangeAttack(p, n); } else { MeleeAttack(p, n); } } catch(Exception e) { } }[/quote]But try replacing it with this but backup the old one first:

public void Attack(NPC n) { if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; } if(p.isDead() || n.isDead()) { p.resetAttack(); return; } if(p.AttackingNpc == false) { return; } Equipment e = p.getEquipment(); if(n.getId() == 3375) { if(e.get(Equipment.SLOT_WEAPON) == null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a rubber chicken to attack this"); n.Attacking = false; p.resetAttack(); return; } if(e.get(Equipment.SLOT_WEAPON).getId() != 4566) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a rubber chicken to attack this"); n.Attacking = false; p.resetAttack(); return; } } if (p.THICKSKIN == true && p.PrayerTime == 0) { n.hit(Misc.random(25)); p.PrayerTime = 15; n.graphics(1935); return; } if(p.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SLAYER) < p.getSlayer().getRequiredLevel(n.getId())) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of " + p.getSlayer().getRequiredLevel(n.getId()) + " slayer to attack this monster!"); p.resetAttack(); return; } n.pid = p.getIndex(); n.giveDrop = p.getIndex(); n.Attacking = true; if(autoCasting == true) { MagicAttack(p, n); } else if (usingRange(p)) { RangeAttack(p, n); } else { MeleeAttack(p, n); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I InDrEk I, post:4, topic:418422”]PlayerVsNpc.java then

post the public void Attack.[/quote]

here you go:

public void Attack(NPC n) { try { if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; } if(p.isDead() || n.isDead()) { p.resetAttack(); return; } if(p.AttackingNpc == false) { return; } n.pid = p.getIndex(); n.giveDrop = p.getIndex(); n.Attacking = true; if(autoCasting == true) { MagicAttack(p, n); } else if (usingRange(p)) { RangeAttack(p, n); } else { MeleeAttack(p, n); } } catch(Exception e) { } }
